description.value: CodeSystem for the eRS Review Reason

display.value: The patients referral is currently pending review with a service
The patients referral is deferred to the service because there were no available slots at the time of attempting to book an appointment
The patients referral is deferred to the service because when attempting to book the slot, it became unavailable
The patients referral is deferred to the service because a problem occurred when attempting to book a slot
